amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate concerning the provision of health care for children before providing tax cuts for the wealthy.

action.text: Amendment SA 2596 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2596 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 337.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2596.
Amendment SA 2596 proposed by Senator Durbin. To express the sense of the Senate concerning the provision of health care for children before providing tax cuts for the wealthy.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2596 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 337.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2596 proposed by Senator Durbin.
